LocationShippingCarrierMethod.name: LocationShippingCarrierMethod
LocationShippingCarrierMethod.description: The available shipping carrier services associated with a location or location group. Allows the assignment of different shipping methods to a specific location and enables flexibility and customization in the shipping process.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the record was last viewed.

Name.description: Name of the shipping carrier service associated with the location or location group.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who currently owns this LocationShippingCarrierMethod object. Default value is the user logged in to the API to perform the create.
